CustomField.formula:
If( and (OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "closed won"),ISPICKVAL(StageName, "closed lost")),CloseDate < DATE(2023,04,15)) ,Legacy_TCV__c, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__NetAmount__c))&&SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__NetAmount__c >1, SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__NetAmount__c,
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Manual_TCV__c))&& Manual_TCV__c > 1, Manual_TCV__c, Legacy_TCV__c)))
CustomField.label: TCV
